articles.title: Apple kills $329 iPad with home button, Lightning port - Ars Technica
articles.content:
37
Apple is lowering the price of its 10th-generation iPad from $399 to $349, the company announced at its Let Loose event today.
The 10th-generation iPad did away with the top and bottom bezels th… [+753 chars]

articles.title: Stock market crash: Investors lose ₹5.5 lakh crore as Sensex, Nifty fall today - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Stock market crash: PowerGrid, JSW Steel, Tata Steel, NTPC, IndusInd Bank, HCL Tech, Tata Motors, M&M, ICICI Bank, Titan and Axis Bank led the losses on Sensex.
articles.content: Stock market crash today: Sensex fell almost 600 points to 73,294 as it witnessed sell offs. Nifty also slipped 200 points to 22,242 as weak investor sentiment was seen on Dalal Street. Compared to t… [+1322 chars]
